name: Welcome Email
description: Sent to new users upon registration.
subject: Welcome to Our Service, {{ user.name }}!
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},
    Welcome to our service! We are excited to have you on board.

name: Password Reset
description: Sent to users who request a password reset.
subject: Password Reset Request
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},
    Please click the following link to reset your password: {{ reset_link }}

name: Order Confirmation
description: Sent to users after they place an order.
subject: Your Order #{{ order.id }} is Confirmed!

name: Shipping Notification
description: Sent to users when their order has shipped.
subject: Your Order #{{ order.id }} Has Shipped!
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

Good news! Your order #{{ order.id }} has shipped. You can track your package here: {{ tracking_link }}

name: Account Verification
description: Sent to new users to verify their email address.
subject: Verify Your Email Address
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

Please click the following link to verify your email address: {{ verification_link }}

name: Newsletter Subscription
description: Sent to users who subscribe to the newsletter.
subject: You're Subscribed!
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

Thank you for subscribing to our newsletter. You will now receive updates from us.

name: Trial Ending Reminder
description: Sent to users whose free trial is about to expire.
subject: Your Free Trial is Ending Soon
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

Your free trial will end in {{ trial_days_left }} days. Upgrade to a paid plan to continue using our service: {{ upgrade_link }}

name: Invoice Payment Due
description: Sent to users when an invoice payment is due.
subject: Invoice #{{ invoice.id }} is due
body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

This is a reminder that invoice #{{ invoice.id }} for ${{ invoice.amount }} is due on {{ invoice.due_date }}. You can view and pay the invoice here: {{ invoice_link }}

name: New Feature Announcement
description: Sent to users to announce a new feature.
subject: New Feature: {{ feature.name }}

name: User Invitation
description: Sent to invite a new user to a team or organization.
subject: You've been invited to join {{ organization.name }}
